## hpr2633 :: Elm - First Impressions

 
Official site: https://elm-lang.org/
Online package repository: https://package.elm-lang.org/
please-focus (package for writing lenses): https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/SwiftsNamesake/please-focus/latest
json-extra (for working with json): https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/elm-community/json-extra/latest
elm-decode-pipeline (another library for decoding json): https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/NoRedInk/elm-decode-pipeline/latest
